raw_body: ABEYSEKARA – CLAUDIA CLORIDA HEYZER – (nee SCHOKMAN),​ Beloved daughter of the late Sylvester Waldren Ralph Schokman and Prinzie Evaldine Camelia Diasz,​ much loved wife of the late Derrick Heyzer and Nimal Abeysekara,​ mother of Daymon,​ cherished sister of the late Keith (Jean),​ Loretta (Tyronne Martill),​ late Sylvester (Maryanne),​ Aloma (late Elmo Vanderstraaten),​ late Jerome (Visakha),​ Ian (Chrishanthie) and Judith (late K. Kirubananthan),​ passed away peacefully. Remains lie in State,​ from 5.00 p.m. onwards,​ on 29th January at Supreme Funeral Parlour – Elvitigala Mawatha (Opposite Kanatte). Funeral will commence at 4.00 p.m. on 30th January,​ followed by Burial at the Borella General Cemetery (Anglican Section).           006698
